meta.description: Source Index for the Worldbuilding Interactive Program. Maps each of the 52 progression steps to the relevant line ranges in source-text.txt.
meta.structure_note: source-text.txt contains three copies of the content: (1) brief ToC/outline at lines 1-397, (2) section outline at lines 398-872 and 873-1238, (3) chapter summaries at lines 1538-2533, and (4) FULL TEXT starting at Volume 1 line 2534, Volume 2 line 3779, Volume 3 line 6103. This index references the full text version.

1.title: Define Your World Building Scope and Strategy
1.source_chapter: V1 Ch1 -- Why Build a World?

line_ranges.topic: Why build a world, using analogues, career decisions
One world vs many worlds, depth vs breadth
Problem of exposition, show vs tell

key_quotes.context: The motivation for world building and when it is voluntary vs expected

Commerce -- monetary system, currency conversion, determining value
